faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for all products. Items must be in their original condition with tags attached. To initiate a return, please contact our customer service team or use the return portal on our website.

faqs.question: How long does shipping take?
faqs.answer: Standard shipping typically takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping (2-3 business days) and overnight shipping (1 business day) options are also available at checkout. Shipping times may vary during holidays.

faqs.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we ship to over 50 countries worldwide. International shipping times vary by location, typically ranging from 10-21 business days. Additional customs fees may apply depending on your country's regulations.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and bank transfers. All payments are processed securely through encrypted channels.

faqs.question: How can I track my order?
faqs.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can use this number to track your package on our website's tracking page or directly with the shipping carrier.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my order?
faqs.answer: Orders can be cancelled within 24 hours of placement if they haven't been processed yet. After that, you'll need to wait for delivery and use our return process. Contact customer service immediately if you need to cancel.

faqs.question: What is your refund policy?
faqs.answer: Refunds are processed within 5-10 business days after we receive your returned item. The refund will be issued to the original payment method. Processing times may vary by payment provider.

faqs.question: Do you have a physical store?
faqs.answer: We currently operate as an online-only retailer. However, we have pop-up stores in select cities during special events. Follow our social media for announcements about upcoming pop-up locations.

faqs.question: How do I contact customer service?
faqs.answer: You can reach our customer service team via email at support@example.com, phone at 1-800-EXAMPLE (available Monday-Friday, 9 AM - 6 PM EST), or through the live chat feature on our website.

faqs.question: What is your warranty policy?
faqs.answer: All products come with a manufacturer's warranty. Warranty periods vary by product type, typically ranging from 1-3 years. Warranty information is included in your product documentation. Contact us for warranty claims.

faqs.question: Do you offer gift wrapping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer gift wrapping services for an additional fee. You can select this option during checkout. We also offer gift messages that will be included with your order.

faqs.question: How do I create an account?
faqs.answer: Creating an account is easy! Click on 'Sign Up' in the top right corner, enter your email address and create a password. You'll receive a verification email to confirm your account. Alternatively, you can sign up using your Google or Facebook account.

faqs.question: I forgot my password. How do I reset it?
faqs.answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email address, and we'll send you a password reset link. The link will be valid for 24 hours. If you don't receive the email, check your spam folder.

faqs.question: Are your products eco-friendly?
faqs.answer: We are committed to sustainability. Many of our products are made from eco-friendly materials, and we're continuously working to increase our sustainable product range. Look for the 'Eco-Friendly' badge on product pages.

faqs.question: Do you offer student discounts?
faqs.answer: Yes! Students can receive a 10% discount by verifying their student status through our student discount program. Sign up with your .edu email address or use your student ID to verify eligibility.
